domain.name: Person

domain.name: Actor
domain.description: An actor or actress in the world, like Kate Winslet or Leonardo DiCaprio

text: @tomhanks @arimoin Hi. Is it OK to ask you a question, with you being so famous and all? I was wondering, do you still have COVID-19 antibodies in your blood? It’s been a while since you had it, and I’d like to have some hope that immunity is possible! Many thanks for your time, K.
